survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Digital Bookstores
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on their experience with digital bookstores to improve service quality and user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase books from digital bookstores?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to simplify response analysis.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for this single-choice question.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase books from digital bookstores?

questions.question_text: Which digital bookstore(s) do you use most frequently?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture usage patterns accurately.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for this multi-choice question.

script.question_text: Which digital bookstore(s) do you use most frequently?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you choose digital bookstores over physical ones?
